description: (A) Conversion/extension 84-90 Southgate Road for 12 flats;9 flats on site of 92-96A Southgate Road;16 houses to land at rear. (B) Conservation Area consent for demolition 92/96A Southgate Road. (C) Listed Building Consent to refurbish 61/63 Northchurch Road. APPLICANT'S PLAN NOS:CP2/A11A/12A A13 15A A15 18A 19A 20A 27.
decision_conditions: This Council has the following observations:- The proposal involves the loss of an employment generating use and is contrary to this Council's employment policies. If L.B. Hackney accept the principle of the change of use of the site then this Council raises no objection to the proposed scheme, but would comment that parking provision is slightly below this Council's standards. This Council would also welcome the provision of units capable of use for the disabled.
